Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property":

* "film morphology" - This term refers to the structure or texture of a film, rather than a material property value.
* "exciton separation" - This term refers to the separation of excitons, which are quasiparticles that arise in certain materials due to the interaction of light and matter. While it is related to material properties, it is not a direct measure of a material property value.
* "carrier mobility" - This term refers to the ability of charge carriers (such as electrons or holes) to move through a material, which can affect the material's electrical conductivity. While it is related to material properties, it is not a direct measure of a material property value.
